subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
Corrupted variant of {{l|zh|著}} ({{l|zh|艹}} → {{l|zh|䒑}}; {{l|zh|日}} → {{l|zh|目}}). Recorded as an unorthodox form ({{zh-l|俗字*}}) in the {{w|Tang dynasty}} orthographic dictionary ''{{w|Ganlu Zishu}}'' {{w2|zh|pref=《|干祿字書|suf=》}}. <!-- Refer http://dict.variants.moe.edu.tw/variants/rbt/word_attribute.rbt?educode=A03506-015#18 -->

Later dictionaries such as the {{w|Ming dynasty}} {{lang|zh|《字學三正》}} and {{w|Qing dynasty}} ''{{w|Zhengzitong}}'' {{w2|zh|pref=《|正字通|suf=》}} recorded the glyph as {{lang|zh|⿱𦍌⿰丿目}}.

subSections.title: Usage notes
